comment: This was a fairly easy class. Group tests. But like a couple people said...she can be not so nice. The way she talks to students can be very condescending.

I really enjoyed Professor Eaton's class.  At first I was hesitant about taking her class because of the work load that was posted but it was totally worth it.  I wish I could take her for more of my classes.  There were two presentations, two major papers, and two tests.  She might give a pop quiz and there are a few small assignments.
I LOVE Professor Eaton!  It is evident that she is passionate about Cultural Competence (and Human Services in general).  Looking to take her again in the future.
I love professor Eaton! She is easy to talk to both inside and outside of the class. She is helpful and really passionate about what she teaches!
Love this woman!!!!  She is awesome.

I loved Professor Eaton style of teaching so much that I took her again, learned alot about myself and the ethnic groups around me, I can now say that I am Cultural Competent. Great Professor and she loves to teach and is willing to assist you if you have questions.

Tests were in groups and open book, and assignments were relatively easy. 2 Group projects, with papers. Eaton is nice most of the time, but can be moody and rude on her "off" days. Class content was interesting and helpful, but the style and clarity of teaching wasn't my favorite. Wouldn't recommend her or take her again.
Test were extremely long, can be moody from class to class.  Very good material.  She sometimes gives you answers that are later marked wrong, and will ask you what does the book say.  BE WARE

Love Prof. Eaton!  She will work you hard, but you will learn alot and you will use the book every class. Love the group test process! You will write alot of papers, APA style. Received an "A". Loved her teaching style, so I'm taking her for HS 2250.

Prof Eaton is a wonderful professor. She is really passionate about what she does, and is flexible in letting the class redo and turn in late assignments. However she is has many assignments, and is extremely nitpicky about how to turn in assignments or the length of a paper or how long a presentation should be. Do exactly what she requires and you

Love prof. Eaton, she is awesome. She has a passion for the material which is nice to see. Go to class, do the assignments and you are guarenteed an A! You take all of your tests as a group and do lots of group work. Sh can seem mean, but she is generally a nice woman. I know for a fact that she truly does care for her students.TAKE HER! Greatclass
She can be nice sometimes or she can be totally rude.  She has her days, so I didnt like her at all. Overall, the class was pretty easy A.

This professor was extremely helpful, and made it clear as to what she wanted from her class.  I am not sure what all this "grouchy stuff" is about her, everyone has a bad day.  She was always nice to me, and as far as "her past", well give it a few years kid, you will have "a past" as well!  Great class, keep teaching@

Easy class if you simply pay attention to the powerpoints. She is a nice woman, but sometimes unpleasant. It has to be because of her past and what not, if you understand that then you will understand her and respect her. Overall: good teacher.

Easy and fun class but teacher is grouchy and demeaning to students. She was fine for the first 2 weeks of class, then did a 180.  Not as clear on papers as she should be. Not understanding of unexpected circumstances and not so "nondogmatic". Learned a lot though.
VERY easy class, but she can be grumpy. She liked to make people look stupid for asking questions or for having opinions. Pretty much just keep your mouth shut and you'll get an A.
Nice teacher but not as clear as I had heard she was on  assignments!! Don't miss class
VERY, good teacher. She makes all assignments clear and easy she is very helpful and easy. I got an Ain her class. Very nice teacher I would take her again.
clear easy nice lady
Fun class.  Do the activities and assignments and you will get a good grade.
